name: Step On, Die
description:
A tactics arcade game where you make an attack every time you move. The attack depends on which number is face up on the die you are standing on. Losing 3 lives or being surrounded results in a loss. Try to achieve a high score! Move with WASD.

*Note: if you are having issues with the controls in the browser version, try pressing 'TAB'. Otherwise, you may need to download the game.*

Submission to GMTK Game Jam 2022

Music: 8BIT to 8 Beat by Addpico

Font: m5x7 by Daniel Linssen

All other assets created by me.

Made with Godot engine
